entry.def: Hockey is an outdoor game played between two teams of 11 players who use long curved sticks to hit a small ball and try to score goals.

example.ex: She played hockey for the national side.

entry.def: Hockey is a game played on ice between two teams of 11 players who use long curved sticks to hit a small rubber disk, called a puck, and try to score goals.

means.word_mean: 1. hockey played on a field; two opposing teams use curved sticks to drive a ball into the opponents' net
2. a game played on an ice rink by two opposing teams of 6 skaters each who try to knock a flat round puck into the opponents' goal with hockey sticks
